explanations.Large Language Model: The paper explicitly mentions the use of a large language model (LLM) to classify electronic health record (EHR) text.
explanations.LLM: The paper discusses the use of a large language model (LLM) for classifying EHR text, which is a key part of the study.
explanations.ChatGPT: The paper specifically uses Chat Generative Pre-trained Transformer (ChatGPT) to classify EHR text, making this keyword highly relevant.
